# upNextTitle

**Instance Property**

The title for the Up Next button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var upNextTitle: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you display the Up Next button in your app by setting [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNowPlayingTemplate/isUpNextButtonEnabled] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], use this property to set the button’s title. If you don’t specify a title, CarPlay uses the system default title.

## Managing Albums, Artists, and Up Next

- **isAlbumArtistButtonEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the album and artist string is a button.
- **isUpNextButtonEnabled**: A Boolean value that manages the display of the Up Next button.
